Class InterbankSubsystemController

public class InterbankSubsystemController
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Hikaru

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    InterbankSubsystemController()
    create a controller for interbank subsystem

  • Constructor Details

    • InterbankSubsystemController

      public InterbankSubsystemController()
      create a controller for interbank subsystem

  • Method Details

    • handleResponse

      public void handleResponse() throws InterbankException
      handle response received from the bank
      Throws:
      InterbankException - indicates and error occurs on the bank side

    • perform

      public void perform​(Transaction transaction) throws InternalServerException, InterbankUndefinedException
      Parameters:
      transaction - information about the refund transaction
      Throws:
      InternalServerException - if the bank returns error or there is errors from from the interbank subsystem
      InterbankUndefinedException - if there is an undefined error occurs during the transaction

    • queryBalance

      public double queryBalance​(CreditCard creditCard) throws InvalidCardException, InterbankUndefinedException
      query information about the account associated to the credit card
      Parameters:
      creditCard - information about the credit card
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - if there is no information associated to the credit card, or the information is not valid
      InterbankUndefinedException - if there is an undefined error occurs during the transaction
